div.p: Viindoo's artificial intelligence engine predicts the success rate of each opportunity based on your history. You can always update the success rate manually, but if you let Viindoo do the job the score is updated while the opportunity moves forward in your sales cycle.
Tip: Do not waste time recording customers' data

Did you know you can search a company by name or VAT number to instantly fill in all its data? The system autocompletes everything for you: logo, address, company size, business information, social media accounts, etc.
Tip: Turn a selection of opportunities into a map
Did you know you can turn a list of opportunities into a map view, using the top-right map icon? A lot of screens in system can be turned into a map: tasks, contacts, delivery orders, etc.
